FuncDef:
The tunnel radius-force command configures the forced tunnel authentication of RADIUS. If the RADIUS delivers the tunnel password attribute, the peer end will be authenticated.
The undo tunnel radius-force command deletes the forced RADIUS tunnel authentication.
By default, forced RADIUS tunnel authentication is not enabled in the L2TP group.
ExtraInfo: In forced RADIUS tunnel authentication, the attributes delivered by the RADIUS server determine whether to authenticate a tunnel. If the attributes delivered by the RADIUS server contain the tunnel password, the LNS or LAC authenticates the tunnel by using the password; otherwise, the LNS or LAC does not authenticate the tunnel.
